name: theory_of_mind
description: Read 2-sentence stories about other people, answer short questions

name: n_back
description: Judge if the current stimulus is the same presented 2 serial positions back

name: action_observation
description: Watch videos of people tying knots - remember knot name

name: verb_generation
description: Read nouns or generate an associated verb

name: romance_movie
description: 30s clips of the movie "up", no audio no subtitles

name: rest
description: Lie in scanner with a fixation cross

name: tongue_movement
description: Move tongue from right to left at 1Hz

name: oddball
description: Identify red 'K' from red or black 'K' or 'O'

name: finger_sequence
description: Type out random sequences of 4 finger digits (control: single finger movements)

name: semantic_prediction
description: sentence presented, participants decide if last word makes sense.

name: visual_search
description: geometric shapes presented on screen, participants must identify if 'L' is present.
